div.p: Unit 5, VPRS 927/P0000 Correspondence relating to various exhibitions, Trustees of the Public Library, Museums and National Gallery of Victoria, Public Record Office, Victoria.
No addressee is indicated but Knight was Secretary of the Commissioners for the 1867 Intercolonial Exhibition of Australasia. 23/8/67

Will you be so good to submit these pages to the Printing Committee with a view of obtaining authority that these notes may still be appended to the jurors report for veget. substances.
See Intercolonial Exhibition of Australasia (1867). M’s 'Notes on the vegetable products' is a complex set of reports (see comments under B67.13.11). There is an appendix, pp. 263-4 (B67.13.10), which may be the material submitted with this letter. These examinations were only closed this day in my laboratory
